fulltext:
Tran Thien Khiem 
-
Graduated from the University of Information Technology VNU-HCM (in 2013) 
Have been working as a software engineer since 2013 for two companies (FPT Software HCM,
Vietnam, 2013-2016 and MainSpring Technology, Indonesia, 2016-now) 
Work as a backend developer with Java, Python, PHP, a front-end developer with HTML, CSS,
Javascript and mobile app developer with Android 
Have experiences on Big-data, Machine Learning and social media marketing 
-
-
-
Working Experiences 
9/2016 - Now  (MainSpring Technologies, Jakarta) 
Social marketing engineer and Team leader 
Project:  Organic user growth 
Description :  
Get new users and increase old user app engagement (re-engagement) from Facebook fan pages, Twitter
and Instagram 
Responsibilities: 
●
Take full responsibility to create an automated system to fetch the recommended contents, post
into social media channels (FB, Twitter and Instagram), analyse its performance insights and
optimize it to get new users and engage users come back to the app 
Technologies:  
●
Python, FB, Twitter SDK  
Achievement  : 
●
Reach 1+ million users, 80+ new users/day, 0.18% re-engagement 
Project:  Content pipeline for social media marketing automation 
Description :  
Using Machine learning to build a content recommendation system for social media marketing 
Responsibilities: 
●
Research Machine Learning models: Linear Regression, Classification, Clustering, Artificial Neural
Network (ANN), Convolutional Neural Network (CNN), Recurrent Neural Network (RNN), Natural
Language Processing (NLP), etc 
●
Apply Machine Learning models to create a rank model 
Technologies:  
● Python  
●
Machine Learning libraries 
Achievement  : 
●
Building a rank model with Deep Neural Network (DNN) to predict a good CTR article with the
precision is 70+% 
Project:  Social media marketing automation 
Description :  
Internal tools to automate the social media marketing processes (FB, Twitter, Instagram) 
Responsibilities:  develop  backend  features for: 
●
Facebook Ads Automation: automate creating campaigns process 
●
Facebook Rule Tool: automate bidding, turn on, turn off campaigns 
●
Rule Log Monitoring Tool: search log details, summarize log status, warning alert 
Technologies:  
●
Python for backend, Facebook SDK 
●
PHP, AngularJS for frontend 
Achievement  : 
●
Marketing team saves 80% time with the automation tool 
Big-data engineer and Team leader  
Project Description :  
Build an analytic system to analyze app events, user behavior to improve app content quality and
marketing performance 
Responsibilities:  Re-structure the old system with: 
●
Log handler: build log handling server with Netty and write data to Kafka 
●
Log cluster writer: reading log from Kafka, process and write to Elasticsearch, Redis, Raw file
system and forward it to other systems to unify the data 
●
Log cluster tracking: display cluster status info: Kafka partition’s status, the health of workers,
processors, writers, etc 
●
Log api: built on top of Elasticsearch to get out the aggregation of log information 
●
Hadoop cluster: store raw log events to Hbase and HDFS. Build data warehouse for ad-hoc query
with long time range with Apache Phoenix and Hive 
Technologies  : 
●
Big-data tools: Kafka, Elasticsearch, Redis, Hive, Hbase 
● Java 
Achievement  : 
●
The new system running with the memory heap is under controlled (not increase to overflow)
day by day 
●
Be able to handle average 100+ million events per day. Visually 14-day data in Kibana charts 
6/2013 – 9/2016  (FPT Software, HCM, Vietnam) 
Project:  Metadata Management Tool 
Description : Maintain and add new features to project Metadata Management Tool. Customer is
DirecTV, a US client which provide satellite TV programs, now merged to AT&T 
Responsibilities:  Develop new features:  
●
Manage and track all metadata related to TV Program like: title, description, thumbnail, release
year. Support end-user to view, search, schedule a report, download, email, create ticket to fulfill
missing metadata… 
●
BigData prototype project : migrate the current project to Hadoop environment to get the benefit
from batch processing to generate the missing metadata report. Batch processing is based on
MapReduce, Oozie, Pig, Hive, data is stored in HDFS. 
Technologies:  
●
Backend: Java core, Spring, JPA, Jersey, Redis cache, ActiveMQ, Quartz scheduler 
●
Front-end: Liferay Portal, Jquery, BackboneJs, AngularJs, HTML5, Css 
●
Testing: Mockito, PowerMock (Unit Test), DBUnit, Spring test, REST-assured (Integration test),
Selenium (UI Test) 
●
Server: Weblogic 
●
DB: Oracle 
Project:  Universal Profile – DirecTV Customer (US client) 
Description: Manage universal user profile, which allows user login in multiple devices (laptop, PC,
mobile and smart TV)  
Responsibilities  :  
●
Write unit test for some functions 
Technologies :  Spring, Jersey, Mockito, Maven 
3/2013 – 6/2013 
Project:  Simple Issue Tracker, final school project 
Description : Develop a tool for issue tracking. User can create a project, add member, add issue and
assign issue to resolver. All status will be shown on the dashboard page. Each member has a role so they
are only login to their pages to get and edit information. 
Responsibilities:  
●
View:   Create a web app using ExtJs 4. 
●
Business Logic: implemented using Struts 2. 
●
Persistence Layer: Implement by Hibernate 3. Business logic produce data and send to View
Layer by JSON and Hibernate 3 map all table in DB to object so these parts are separate, very
easy to maintain and expand. 
Technologies:   ExtJs 4,  Struts 2, Hibernate 3 
9/2012 – 3/2013 
Drupal 7 Developer (iStar Solution company, HCM, Part-time job) 
Project Description :
Build a website and Facebook App for Vinasoy Corp company to present their
events to introduce the new products.  
The website must be beautiful and give helpful information to the visitor. Visitors can register to receive
free-trial milk on Facebook and Website. All orders will be gathered and processed by Vinasoy Corp
employees, then the milk will be delivered to visitors 
Responsibilities:  
●
Develop UI, web pages with Drupal 7 
●
Implement functionalities to generate random number for coupon gift, receive user register
information… 
Technologies:   PHP, Drupal 7, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery 
Other projects: 
Website ATZ Solutions 
Project Description :  Build a website ATZ Solutions Company 
Responsibilities:  
●
Design and develop pages: Home, About Us, Production & Solutions, etc 
●
Handle Contact form submission and Sending email 
Technologies:   Drupal 7 
Link :  http://atzsolutions.com.vn/ 
Website Ba Ria - Vung Tau University 
Project Description :
Build a website for the Ba Ria – Vung Tau’s university and its faculties using
Liferay Portal, displaying useful information for students and visitors. User interface must look neat, easy
to use and stable day by day. 
Responsibilities  :  
●
Design website structure: master site, department sites, support sites 
●
Develop Front-end pages (Main page, details pages, management pages) 
●
Develop News, User, Document management system, LDAP authentication system (portlets in
Liferay) 
Technologies:   Liferay Portal 
Link : http://bvu.edu.vn/ 
Education 
●
The University Of Information Technology – Major: Software Engineer (GPA: 8.4/10) 
●
Zend Framework (PHP) course at Nhat Nghe IT 
●
Self learning Big-data, Machine learning courses in Coursera.com, Udemy.com 
Certiﬁcation 
●
Liferay Certified Professional Developer 6.1
